title: 10/21/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 10/21/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps yesterday's MLB Playoff games and discusses comments made by former Bears Offensive Lineman Olin Kreutz about Aaron Rodgers. Chris "Mad Dog Russo" calls in to talk about the Dodgers chances of coming back in the series down 3-1. And Mike Florio discusses how close we are to a Deshaun Watson trade.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps yesterday's MLB Playoff games and discusses comments made by former Bears Offensive Lineman Olin Kreutz about Aaron Rodgers. Chris "Mad Dog Russo" calls in to talk about the Dodgers chances of coming back in the series down 3-1. And Mike Florio discusses how close we are to a Deshaun Watson trade.
